status.title: System Status
status.description: Real-time monitoring and data source information

strategy.title: About the GEM Strategy
strategy.subtitle: Understanding Global Equity Momentum investing
strategy.whatIsDescription: Global Equity Momentum (GEM) is a systematic investment strategy that rotates between {eq1}, {eq2}, and {bond} based on 12-month momentum. The strategy selects the best-performing equity asset if its momentum exceeds the {threshold}; otherwise, it allocates to bonds for downside protection.
strategy.howItWorksStep2: Select the equity asset with higher momentum
strategy.howItWorksStep3: If selected equity exceeds {threshold} returns, allocate 100% to that equity
strategy.howItWorksStep4: Otherwise, move to {bond} ({bondTick}) for capital preservation
strategy.howItWorksStep5: Rebalance monthly based on updated momentum signals
strategy.resourceCraftsman: Global Equity Momentum: A Craftsman's Perspective

allocation.title: Current Allocation
allocation.interpretationEq1: {eq1} ({eq1Mom}) outperform both international stocks ({eq2Mom}) and {threshold} ({thresholdMom}). The strategy allocates 100% to this asset for maximum growth potential.
allocation.interpretationEq2: {eq2} ({eq2Mom}) demonstrate superior momentum compared to {eq1} ({eq1Mom}) and exceed the {threshold} threshold ({thresholdMom}). The strategy rotates for optimal returns.
allocation.interpretationBondBoth: Neither {eq1} ({eq1Mom}) nor {eq2} ({eq2Mom}) exceed the {threshold} ({thresholdMom}) threshold. The strategy moves to bonds ({bondMom}) for capital preservation.
allocation.interpretationBondDefensive: Equity momentum does not sufficiently exceed the risk-free rate. The strategy defensively positions in bonds ({bondMom}) to protect capital.

history.title: History Analysis
history.cardDescription: Chart and table show the same date range

allocationChanges.title: Allocation Changes
allocationChanges.stableHistory: Signal has been stable as {signal} for the entire available history ({days} days).
